name: @soundworks/state-manager-osc
description: Utility to monitor and control soundworks' shared state within Max through OSC
author: Etienne DÃ©moulin
Benjamin Matuszewski

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && chokidar src -c "npm run build"
scripts.postversion: node bin/sync-max-package-version.js && cd max/soundworks/javascript && npm install package-lock-only && git commit -am 'synced version'
